input.sentences: we are at a very old church .
this is one of the statues there .
output.sentences: There is a church with rainbows in its walls.
The patron saint accepts this and red flowers are given to him in his honor.
Mass is also held in this church, a crucifix of Jesus hands hangs in the middle.
Next to it, a memorial has been built out of stone and metal for Jesus as well.
On the floor there is another memorial for the massacred people of 1979.
